name: GreatFamily Genealogy Data File
summary: A GD3 file is a genealogy data file created by GreatProgs GreatFamily, a program used to design and record family tree genealogy. It contains information about a family, which includes a graphical representation of how each person is related, along with a database that stores information about each individual in the family tree.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: GD3 file open in GreatProgs GreatFamily 2.2
